sections.heading: 996 through 996.3 of this title shall be known and may be cited as the "Delayed Sentencing Program for Young Adults”
sections.text: This act is also recognized as the Regimented Inmate Discipline (RID) Program.Added by Laws 1987, c. 119, § 1, eff. Nov. 1, 1987. Amended by Laws 2003, c. 323, § 1, eff. July 1, 2003
